articles.title: Trump says Israel-Iran ceasefire is in effect after deal initially faltered
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump says a ceasefire between Iran and Israel is in effect after the deal initially faltered and the American leader expressed deep frustration with both sides.

articles.title: World wary as it welcomes Iran-Israel ceasefire
articles.description: Updates on the ceasefire between Israel and Iran, including reactions from around the world.

articles.title: Supreme Court allows Trump to restart swift deportation of migrants away from their home countries
articles.description: The Supreme Court has allowed the Trump administration to resume deporting migrants to countries where they don't have citizenship or ties, without notice or a chance to contest the destination.
